content.rendered:
CORPORATE EVENT

PLANNING & DESIGN

CORPORATE EVENT

PLANNING & DESIGN

In the fast-paced corporate world, Infinity Hospitality stands out as your trusted destination management partner, handling every detail while crafting a tailored experience that reflects your company's vision.

Whether it’s attracting new customers, educating your employees, or celebrating company milestones, we’ll help you create and execute the event strategy you have in mind. Once booked, we will collaborate with you to build the foundation of your event, creating an inspiration board and floor plan based on your goals. Then from the production to design, your Infinity team will bring your brand to life through our high quality planning and management services, as well as day-of coordination.

In the fast-paced corporate world, Infinity Hospitality stands out as your trusted destination management partner, handling every detail while crafting a tailored experience that reflects your company's vision.

Whether it’s attracting new customers, educating your employees, or celebrating company milestones, we’ll help you create and execute the event strategy you have in mind. Once booked, we will collaborate with you to build the foundation of your event, creating an inspiration board and floor plan based on your goals. Then from the production to design, your Infinity team will bring your brand to life through our high quality planning and management services, as well as day-of coordination.

EVENT SERVICES

  • Destination Management
  • On-site Coordination & Management
  • Meeting Planning
  • Brand Integration
  • Rentals & Vendor Coordination
  • Floor Plan Design
  • Budget Management
  • Security & Staffing
  • Transportation & Parking

TYPES OF EVENTS

  • Meetings, seminars, speakers, training
  • Company announcements, product launches or releases, milestone celebrations
  • Team-building days, executive retreats
  • Conferences, trade shows, networking events
  • Fundraisers, auctions, charity events
  • Holiday parties, annual parties, employee appreciation
  • Anything else you need!

EVENT SERVICES

  • On-site Coordination & Management
  • Meeting Planning
  • Brand Integration
  • Rentals & Vendor Coordination
  • Floor Plan Design
  • Budget Management
  • Staging
  • Security & Staffing
  • Entertainment
  • Transportation & Parking

TYPES OF EVENTS

  • Meetings, seminars, speakers, training
  • Company announcements, product launches or releases, milestone celebrations
  • Team-building days, executive retreats
  • Conferences, trade shows, networking events
  • Fundraisers, auctions, charity events
  • Holiday parties, annual parties, employee appreciation
  • Anything else you need!

SOME OF OUR CLIENTS

CORPORATE EVENTS

ON THE BLOG

Retro-Styled VIP Dinner With A Modern Twist

A black and gold VIP dinner experience for Vanderbilt guests at the Bridge Building.

Big Machine’s Speakeasy-Inspired CMA After Party at The Bell Tower

An after party for the CMA Awards full of vintage decor at The Bell Tower.

Baylor University’s Industrial Campaign Event at The Bell Tower

An industrial campaign event at The Bell Tower in Nashville for Baylor University by Infinity Hospitality.

SEE MORE
CORPORATE EVENTS

ON THE BLOG

Retro-Styled VIP Dinner With A Modern Twist

A black and gold VIP dinner experience for Vanderbilt guests at the Bridge Building.

Big Machine’s Speakeasy-Inspired CMA After Party at The Bell Tower

An after party for the CMA Awards full of vintage decor at The Bell Tower.

SEE MORE

TESTIMONIALS

FROM OUR CLIENTS

Infinity [Hospitality] is amazing. The customer service is outstanding and they were able to help make my vision come true for my Christmas Party at work. Thank you to the staff and event planner for making it a great night to remember.

Leticia Johnson TMFM

I highly recommend Infinity [Hospitality]! We just used them for our corporate event at the Bell Tower in Nashville and they did an outstanding job! [My event designer and the catering director] were wonderful and creative to work with. THANK YOU!

Camille Stern Urban Land Institute

I used Infinity's Bridge Building to host a work conference evening event. It was AMAZING! My event specialist knew exactly how to turn my vision of a classy casino and cigar lounge into reality. She was professional, timely, and a pleasure to work with. Our guests had nothing but wonderful things to say about the event. I will be working with Infinity again.

Hali McCurdy Des-Case Corporation

Ready to book or need more information?

CONTACT US
Need lighting, audio, and visual technology?

Check out Nashville Lighting & Production, who handles everything from concept to day-of management.

See more of our work.

Take a look at past corporate events Infinity has planned, from cocktail parties to awards ceremonies.

Photos by Details Nashville & Sara Bill Photography.

excerpt.rendered: The Bell Tower was happy to host Big Machine Label Group’s CMA Awards After Party to celebrate country music’s biggest night. The event was filled with vintage-inspired decor, an abundance of velvet, and Sputnik chandelier lighting that created the most amazing speakeasy feel.  The invite only, ultra-exclusive event was attended by artists, celebrities, and tastemakers. […]
